solution_line_template: {not_hit_fraction_first} x {first_batch} = {not_hit_first} tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.
{not_hit_fraction_second} x {second_batch} = {not_hit_second} tennis balls that Ralph didn't hit.
Combined, Ralph was not able to hit {not_hit_first} + {not_hit_second} = <<{not_hit_first}+{not_hit_second}={total_not_hit}>>{total_not_hit} tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.
